uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service

Interface DataService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullDataService, ProxyRestDataService, RestDataServiceV1, SimpleDataService

    public interface DataService
extends Service
    The core API for the data service. The responsibility of the data service is to take the read request from the client, request the trusted details about the request from the palisade service (what policies to apply, user details, etc). The data service is then loops over the list of resources passing the list of rules that need to be applied, taken from the palisade service response (DataRequestConfig) and the resource to be read to the DataReader. The DataReader will then connect to the resource and apply the rules before streaming the data back to the DataService which forwards the data back to the client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default CompletableFuture<?> process(Request request) 
      <RAW_DATA_TYPE>
      CompletableFuture<ReadResponse<RAW_DATA_TYPE>>      		 read(ReadRequest request)
      This method is used by the client code to request the data from the list of resources or a subset of the resources that the palisade service responded with in the DataRequestResponse.

      • Methods inherited from interface uk.gov.gchq.palisade.service.Service

        _getClass, _setClass

    • Method Detail

      • read

        <RAW_DATA_TYPE> CompletableFuture<ReadResponse<RAW_DATA_TYPE>> read(ReadRequest request)
        This method is used by the client code to request the data from the list of resources or a subset of the resources that the palisade service responded with in the DataRequestResponse. This method will only work if the client has already registered the data request with the palisade service.
        Type Parameters:
        RAW_DATA_TYPE - The Java class of the format the data will be returned as.
        Parameters:
        request - The ReadRequest that came from registering the request with the palisade service. The request can be altered to contain only a subset of the resources to be read by this data service instance.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture ReadResponse containing the stream of data in the expected format and/or a message (error/warning/info) to be returned to the client.

      • process

        default CompletableFuture<?> process(Request request)
        Specified by:
        process in interface Service
